      • doorToReveal

        public static int doorToReveal(int c,
                               int u)
        This method returns the door number that is neither the car is in or the user's pick. This method generates a random door number until it finds a door that is not equal to c nor u.
        Parameters:
        c - the door number the car is in
        u - the door number that the user picked
        Returns:
        int
